subject: Re: [junit] Is tests.jvms calculated by junit, ant, or the ant config?
msgSnippet: Thanks for the reply!  I also got a reply on the lucene dev list.  Apparently this is part of the carrotsearch randomizedtesting code that Lucene/Solr employs,
